content: Hello
Hello Devarsh Patel! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?
Who are you?
I am Jarvis, a highly advanced AI chatbot designed to provide accurate and helpful responses to your queries.
who is jeff bezos?
Jeff Bezos is an American technology entrepreneur and investor, best known as the founder, chairman, and CEO of Amazon, the world's largest online retailer.
remenber i am 21 years old.
I'll keep that in mind, Devarsh! As a 21-year-old, you're likely familiar with the tech world and its influencers.

who is Elon Musk ?
According to my real-time information, Elon Musk is a businessman known for his key roles in Tesla, Inc., SpaceX, and Twitter (which he rebranded as X).

According to my real-time information, Elon Musk's net worth is approximately $342.4 billion as of March 10, 2025.

I'm a text-based AI, I don't have the capability to visually rate an image. However, I can provide information about Elon Musk if you'd like!
